member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Word.Layout.Converters.TablixConverter.ProcessGroupsBeforeRow(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Extensibility.Rendering.Components.Tablix.ITablix,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Word.Layout.Grid)
member.summary: Processing the GroupsBeforeRowHeaders property of the tablix The property is the number of instances of the leftmost outer column member that should appear to the left of the row headers Its changing the resulting grid by moving the rowheaders columns to the appropriate number

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Word.Layout.Converters.TablixConverter.ProcessDirection(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Extensibility.Rendering.Components.Tablix.ITablix,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Word.Layout.Grid)
member.summary: Changing the resulting grid if LayoutDirection property is set to RTL. It rolling the grid from right to left and last column becomes first, next to last becomes second and so on

Setting the PageBreakBefore/PageBreakAfter properties in resulting grid Its converting ITablixMember.PageBreak property of type PageBreakLocation by calculating appropriate rowindexes of the resulting grid based on tablix RowHierarchy

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Word.Layout.Converters.TablixConverter.ProcessColumns(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Extensibility.Rendering.Components.Tablix.ITablixMember},System.Int32,System.Int32,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Word.Layout.Grid)
member.summary: Creating column headers (i.e. first rows of the resulting grid except corner) by processing the ColumnHierarchy of the tablix Calculating row/column spans and setting the appropriate ReportItem to the grid cell
